desc: Indoor and outdoor lighting and inflatables for any occasion! Specialising in unique inflatables including; Inflatable Screens, Inflatable Santas, Inflatable Snowman, Inflatable Birthday Cakes and More! As well as a great range of lighting options including custom Neon Lights!

layout.text: Welcome to Mr Inflatable & Lighting Co.
We are a New Zealand owned business bringing unique lighting and inflatable products to Kiwis!
